author: rovere
body:
The machine learning model for particle ID and energy regression has
been retrained using the HLT TDR samples and a more recent version of
the TICL reconstruction and iterations (CMSSW_11_1_X). The model has not
been changed, but the full data-processing and training have been ported
to TF 2.1. The input and output layout and names are kept the same for
backward compatibility reasons.
title: Retrained particle ID model and energy regression for HLT TDR
